name: Sandwich square
description:
Get yourself immersed in  the world of sandwich making with the Sandwich Square Game. Start small and grow big with your expertise in sandwich making in the visually rich  and engaging game play. Serve good, earn more and upgrade your tier. Enjoy the game.

If you like the game you can leave your feedback here: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/VFNGFBT
